lines.text: So I see water and I shove my face down in it and breathe it. Who knows, with me? And I go back to where I burned my fucking foot, and I go into the earring-- I'm not going to fucking jump over that shit again-- tell them what I saw. Yeah, two minutes. So deep fucking breath. Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, two minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And when you see me, run towards me and follow me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. All right. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you good to run and jump over some lava?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys are aware, you can hold your breath for a number of minutes equal to one plus your constitution modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but you were on foot. If I'm on the broom, then maybe it wouldn't take as long, potentially.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were making a careful path. If you were to continue to dash, full dash run, it would be close. You can try it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to put Trinket in the necklace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Trinket in the necklace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to get on the broom with me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got the boots, so I was going to use my boots.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, anybody? Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just a thought, but I do have the big-ass jug that can make a big thing of portable water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Sick!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, we're waterboarding ourselves?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, you can breathe in that shit, right? We won't be able to see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we fit our head in that jug?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've just got to carry the jug, and as long as we stick our head in the jug every time we need to breathe-- you're a genius! You're a genius! I will say that seven more times. We'll space them out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We might run out of water, though, because we're breathing it in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're breathing it back out. You're recycling it. It'll get a little less oxygenated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long does a fish live in a fish tank?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right. We're big fish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The biggest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's try it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Salt water or fresh water? Or wine.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Fresh water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out the Alchemy Jug and I say, fresh water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It fills with fresh water to the surface.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try breathing it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we underwater right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll take it out of the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I stick my head in it. Can I breathe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It works. It works! I'm holding it above the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, smart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hear you can do this with a non-magical jug, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah. We just could have carried water in a jug.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't downplay my special moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have chalices.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We do have an extra chalice. You know what? I'm going to take the fancy chalice and-- as needed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use the breathing jug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the funnest work-around. I love it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a water bong?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially. You guys are gravity-bonging your way through an underwater volcano. If that's not Vox Machina, I don't know what is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's how I solve so many problems in my life. It's the solution to half our problems.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to try to water-bong every combat scenario for the rest of the campaign.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was looking at it, and I was like, fresh water, vinegar, oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't do drugs, everyone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys make your way around the way, through the combination of that druid spell and, strangely, Grog's ingenuity, you guys have bypassed a fairly serious situation. You make it down around the curvature of the tunnel, to where that small lava jump is. Anybody who wants to make that leap, go ahead and make an athletics check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pop Scanlan on the broom and we fly on over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I activated my boots and walk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I use my mantle, which I constantly forget triples my jump distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does, so go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not great. Acrobatics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Athletics.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's better. That's better. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Yeah. You coast over. It's like a soft Neo jump. Not quite that far, but you coast and land onto the side. Grog, what did you get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. You guys all make it across that little stretch of molten rock without an issue. You continue around the way. Vex and Vax, as you guys are making heavy footfalls and making some distance, you begin to feel this (rumbling noise) rumbling in the ground beneath you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think there's something burrowing. Or an earthquake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Earth elementals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Volcanic earth elementals.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody hold still for a moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without a Trace on all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like all of you to make a stealth check right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I think you barely got that in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Barely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's plus ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. 25.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no. Plus ten?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay, that's above something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a feeling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's in the necklace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rumbling stops as you all quietly stand still. You begin to get bold, to take a few more very faint steps on the ground. The rumbling continues and gets louder and louder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) I get my bow ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. I'm going to go to break.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! You fucking didn't!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back to Critical Role.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a barrage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that was making up for the beginning of the game. We have a winner. In the chat, we have johnny2x40 as the winner. Congratulations, johnny2x40. Danoba will contact you shortly to get your information, and we'll get that shipped out to you ASAP, signed by the cast. Congratulations.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The fuck was that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I loved it so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (rumbling, crashing) You hear the crumbling and crashing of stone and rock, as from the side of the hallway, right next to where Grog is standing, maybe about a foot and a half in front of him, you watch some large, pointed object pierce through the wall, maybe about nine feet tall or so, go (explosion) out, sending dust and rock spilling out, and there's a faint orange glow from some smooth, armored head to some large creature with a toothy mouth that opens up and (chomping) as it bites down, you see rows and rows of teeth that are glowing orange, as bits of molten rock are spilling out the sides of the mouth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like 2006's The Core!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I hope it's better than that. You recognize the shape of the front, especially you, Percival, as you spent some time with a creature of a similar shape.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, is it a worm? A purple worm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because it has two, big. muscular, trunk-like arms, as it (crash crash) out in front, but it has no eyes. It has the solid, armored front, and heated edges where the plates meet. It seems to be some sort of elemental-infused or variant of the bulette that you encountered before. And as it breaks through and stops, mere inches from Grog-- turn that thing off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It talks! It's a sentient bulette!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Happy Birthday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a second emerges. (explosion) Two children. They both emerge, going (snarls). As you're all standing there, holding perfectly still.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They can't see us. We'll stand still and we'll be fine, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jurassic Park rules.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sniffs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could attack them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's three of them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The large mother. And turns, Grog, and you have to lean back as the nose sweeps past, and is facing right in your direction. You can see these large holes in the front of its armored snout go (sniffing). The mouth slightly cracks open and curls back into what you could almost imagine to be a grin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I quietly go into a rage? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are not my parents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, as none of you have done anything at this point in time, I need you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See, that's what it was! That's what it was!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I heard you saying it, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should have just done it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't worry about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamnit. No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Every time. Every time I do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, your sneak attack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Fuckers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Grog, who was stopped here, was the last to leap. Keyleth made it all the way over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's in the necklace. We were on the broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Broom over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Might still be able to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax. Where were you? You were stealthed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was near the lead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you would be over here, stealthing behind this rock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What a great board!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is really cool. Oh god, it's huge! Grog! Little baby bulette.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's huge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we remember what its weaknesses were?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know it takes half damage, I think, to non-magical physical attacks. He's got heavily armored skin. Other than that, I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! Did a new light just pop on? And another light? For a red lava effect in my eyes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so initiative order. 25 to 20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it realize that anybody but Grog is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could have, potentially.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And you're 17, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here we go. This is going to be fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 15 to ten?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 12. My lowest possible initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you roll a one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So top of the round, as all of them seem to have shifted in the direction of Grog, who is now quietly raging. Vex, you're up first. What do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. I'm going to try to hit it with a Lightning Arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What animal?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's the mama and two babies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to hit the one that's breathing on Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So go ahead and make your attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, provoke the thing with its teeth closest to me. I'm just fucking with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it knows you're there! Maybe it doesn't know I'm there! Plus I get a sneak attack on it, because you're right next to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to Hunter's Mark it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I say!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She says to you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely. So if that was a 3rd-level Lightning Arrow, then that means I get 3d8 lightning damage in addition to my regular damage, or is it just 3d8 lightning damage? Wait. Roll the attack as normal, the target takes 4d8 lightning damage on a hit. Oh, and every creature within ten feet makes a dexterity saving throw. Okay. If I cast it at 4th-level, so no, it's just 3rd-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's 4d8 lightning damage. So you made the attack roll. It hit. So it takes that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. Really? Nine plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, make a dexterity saving throw, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. I have advantage on those, but I won't need it because that was a 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15. It doesn't actually do my regular arrow attack damage? It's just-- wow. My spells are useless compared to my regular attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So 15 damage. And then 2d8 to Grog. Roll 2d8. And you take half that because you made your save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You still made your save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. What's the damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five damage to you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five total, or that's halved?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's five total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you take two points of lightning damage. Not too bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to hit it again, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lightning Arrow-- well, no. Interesting point of order, Lightning Arrow is a bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and I did Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So no Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so I did Hunter's Mark-- no. Oh. I am never going to do spell attacks ever again. They're worthless for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So no Hunter's Mark, but you hit it with the Lightning Arrow. Next round you can worry about that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your first attack. You have your second attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to attack it with a regular-ass arrow that does more damage, probably-- natural 20-- than a fucking Lightning Arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did not do your sneak attack damage last round, so if you wanted to do sneak attack damage on this, you can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which means you also double the sneak attack damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet. That's seven. 14 plus eight is 22, 24, plus lightning damage. 24 plus five is 29 damage with a regular arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's with the additional sneak attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. No, I get two sneak attacks! Plus another four. 29 plus four. 33.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sneak attack that bitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33 points of damage to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I take that, too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's regular.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you release the Lightning Arrow, it slams into it. (growling) The look shoots in the direction where it came from, and as it opens up its snout to smell, you fire a second arrow into its mouth, and it starts writhing in place as it does. It shakes, and you feel the ground quake in the presence, and a few rocks (impacts) from the ceiling and the children join the wail, and they all turn in your direction. You going to do anything else on your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I get on my broom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you get on your broom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get on my broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all you do? All righty! Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I am, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the beginning of your turn, the heat emanating from this bulette that's right next to you is rather intense. You immediately suffer-- from proximity to its searing body-- 11 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not bad, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are these monsters or beasts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are considered monstrosities.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How tall is the area that we're standing in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The top of the cavern would be about, maybe, ten feet. Ten to 12 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten to 12 feet? Yeah, I'm going to make both of my attacks at Mama Bear. Yeah, because I've got to move. Either I move and it senses the non-stealthy-- yeah, fuck it, I'm just going to take both of my Bloodaxe attacks at it with the first one Great Weapon Master. Not reckless. 21?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 36 points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 36 points of damage on that first hit? Not bad. The axe cracks into the side of its body, and you see the armor crack a little bit where it hits. You pull the axe free, you can see the blood pour out. As it spills and hits the ground, (sizzle) you can see the actual blood in their body is superheated as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great Weapon Master, not reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, not reckless.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's shit. That's going to miss, I think. Yeah. 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're learning, we're learning things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 15. Because I said Great Weapon Master, it's minus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did. That misses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somewhere between 15 and 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is this one time where you do swing and it hits, but the angle of the axe blade hits the edge of its head plate armor, and scrapes off the top with a shower of sparks off to the side. No damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action to rage or not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, yeah, you were beginning to quietly rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. Ends my turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to move?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! I'm right next to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boy, man. I don't know what these things can do. I will step forward a little bit. Super tanky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten feet? Five feet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's good enough for now. No, keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's lava! Careful!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks. I will inspire Grog by singing the customary birthday song of his people, which goes like this, (singing) Happy happy happy, happy happy happy-- they're a very simple people-- happy happy happy happy. (groans) (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You sang that better than my mother! Did I have a mom?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then as practice, I'm going to become my beautiful angel self and transform into a naked planetar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit. Going planetar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume I lose everything. I lose my Heroes' Feast--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why would you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I'm a different creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So? It's still in your blood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this True Polymorph?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe you get it back when you turn back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Generally, it'll say. Because Shapechange, you absorb your armor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you happen to have a planetar figurine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I'm checking. I thought I had one prepared.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god. Guys. Magic: the Gathering Puzzle Quest. Did I mention you can find out more at bit.ly/MagicRole?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did, actually!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They need your support.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know those first generation Black Lotus cards can go for $30,000, depending on their condition.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it the alpha style with the black border?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep. Banned cards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt is really looking for this thing. In the meantime, let me tell you some other amazing Magic: The Gathering cards. I've got Time Twister, Jace the Mind Sculptor--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've actually performed the Jace the Mind Sculptor. It takes three friends to really pull it off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Naked Singularity. Not a sexual position.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the purposes of this, because it is the same size as a large creature, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We will use good old Doty as the current size of your planetar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can touch my miniature! Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You need to be there, because otherwise you'd be stepping in the lava.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that's all I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can continue to move, if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's interesting. As that guy, can I move more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you've moved maybe 15 feet. I'd say you probably have, at his flying speed, maybe a third of his fly speed left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's another 40 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) So there is that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Well, then you guys got this well in hand. I'm going to fly to the other guy. Is he going to get an attack on me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. As I fly up high?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fly to him and you're gliding above right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm going to go to the furthest guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here? (gliding noises) Okay. You're currently floating above the lava. It's not affecting you as you (whoosh) fly by. Because you're flying, no, I will say the mom bulette does not notice you pass. It does not get an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) I'm the Crow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Click the boots. Hunter's Mark on mama. So all that's left is dagger, dagger, dagger, so I'm going to do sharpshooter throws with the three daggers that are left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I within 60 feet? I think I am. All right, so negative five on attacks. The first one is total shit. The second one is 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 does not hit. (dagger ricochets) Ricochets off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 23 on the last.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And because it was a sharpshooter attack, it's 47.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oof. Nice. Great, so that one, seeing the glow of the slight crack in the armor that Grog had left, the dagger disappears inside the slight gap, and you see this (spurt) of super hot, thick, viscous blood spill out and hit the side of the rock and then cool and darken as it does across the side of the cavern wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then for movement, watch this shit right here, folks. (counting) 40, because I'm hasted, 45, 50, 55.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did it my fucking self!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it feel weird to have somebody else moving the people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it felt awesome. I didn't have to do a damn thing. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, and Hunter's Mark!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, the Hunter's Mark damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an additional six damage. All right, infuriated, it's now starting to stomp in the middle, and as it's hitting, the lava's starting to splash up around it. The babies! This one right here is only going to make a bite attack right now. It can't make a leap because you're too close to it. But as you rush towards it, it seems to sense your presence, and the movement of the wings (wing flap) keeping you aloft. And the baby's going to (snapping) and lash out towards you. That is 18.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well that got GIF'ed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dr. Manhattan, in the house!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to go ahead and make a Deadly Leap. 15 (landing) on you. (whoosh) That brings it here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If that was the case, half you guys would've been dead a long time ago. All right, I need you to make a strength or dexterity saving throw, your choice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll do dexterity at advantage because of the boots, so that is a 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27, okay. So you're not knocked prone, but you do take-- let's see here. 19 points of damage, bludgeoning and slashing. You are pushed five feet out of its space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was the total on that, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. The battlefield changed a little bit, so instead, can I do a Chain Lightning out of the staff and hit all three of those motherfuckers? Starting with the big mama and branching off to the two other dudes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I could say you could do that, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's 10d8. And it's a dex? I think it's a dexterity saving throw, and it's 10d8. One, two, three, four, five. Does anyone want to lend me their d8s?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many? I've got five here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have five there? Okay, okay, okay. A little Ashley Johnson "Okay, okay, okay."

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: (imitating Ashley) Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, nope, and nope. No one makes their save. This big, hulking thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I get to reroll ones because I'm a badass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got a bunch, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's a ten. Ooh, that's good. Okay, okay, five, four and four is eight, so that brings us to 13, another-- wait, four and four and eight--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was right, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, so you're at 17 now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 17 plus another four is 21, plus another five is 26, plus another four is 30, plus another six is 36, plus another 16 total. So 36 plus 16 is 52.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 52 points of damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've got another one here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, 52 plus another seven, so 59.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shrieks) They stagger backward. Hurt, but seemingly still holding on. All right, Percy, your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to activate Silence. So that's up. Charge Diplomacy. I'm going to give it a little rev with my bonus action, and I'm going to-- oh wow, can I actually reach? I can't quite reach, but I can get close. I'm going to head against that wall and start climbing up that wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, there we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Is that all you're going to do with your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my action, my bonus action, and my movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's your turn. All right, now it's the mama bulette's turn. Mama bulette has been facing Grog this whole time, after taking the dagger and watching you run past, seeming ready to leap, but with you still right in front of it, she'll attack you. That is a natural 18. This is important. So that's a total of 31 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me check-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's 45 points of piercing damage, halved. We'll say 22, plus 13 points of fire damage... and you are swallowed. On an attack roll of an 18 to 20, it swallows the target. And literally, I rolled a natural 18.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What happens if you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's always me! (laughing) It's always me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What happens if you Titanstone-- never mind. I'm going to find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've done this before. I'm well-versed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are blinded and restrained, currently.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Blinded and restrained.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It now begins to (thudding) go right up into melee range with Keyleth, who blasted it with the Chain Lightning before. That brings us to the top of the round. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to Hunter's Mark it! And then I'm going to attack it with an arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (old woman voice) Bramble Shot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How'd that go again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (old woman voice) Bramble Shot! (normal voice) 25! Oh! Can I do sharpshooter and do minus five to hit, plus ten to attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Generally, you have to decide that before you roll your attack. You can't just add it on like, oh, I rolled well! I'll say no, not for that first attack. You can for your second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This one is a Bramble Shot and it's a 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, cool. Five plus eight is 13, 14, 15. 15 plus sneak attack and lightning damage. 15, 19, 23, 25, and then 4d8 piercing damage. 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 32 points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then he has to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then he succeeds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the arrow slams into the side, the brambles reach around, and you watch as these thorny vines that wrap around the body begin to blacken and burst into flame. By the proximity, the brambles begin to burn to cinders and then break off the body as it storms forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I attack him again. This time I'm going to try as a sharpshooter!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up next, Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holy shit! That'll hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's a Bramble Shot. Do I have to say that before, too? Motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, Bramble Shot gets to see if it hits or not. It's not lost if you missed. If you hit, you can say Bramble Shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same way that Divine Smite can be done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, cool! All right! Right. I'm going to roll all my dice, and then double that, then add my extra things. How about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do that. That's usually how you're supposed to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, Matt. Okay, so 11, 14, 20, 23, 25, 50. That's easy. 58, 60.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 points of damage with one shot! And secondary saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 70 points of damage with a single arrow! You didn't add your sneak attack damage a second time, did you? Okay, good. That is nasty. It rolled a natural 16 plus six for its strength saving throw, so it's not affected by the bramble. However, it is looking

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, only extra two damage for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that end your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm going to move on my broom so he doesn't know I'm there. I'm going to fly to here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, no, it's 25 DC. No, it does not! You do not take the damage because she did enough damage with that crit hit arrow that it vomits you up. You are prone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Happy birthday!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would have been a good 42 points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog gets vomited up in front of me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep! (sizzling) There's steam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Every fucking time. Hi!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You smell like shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, it's your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to stand up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jump into its throat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jump back in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gotta get some fire resistance because good god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big Grog!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, what is that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's swole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think we've seen this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's been it every time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, every time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we haven't seen it! Haven't seen it up close. Oh, Grog is scary as fuck! I'm sorry; you're scary! Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I do reckless, Great Weapon Master?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you may.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's something Travis would say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put me down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's something Travis would say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. 37 on the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Happy happy (war cry).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Happy birthday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After it finishes vomiting you up and you get off the ground, still feeling the sizzling of its salivary liquid on your body, you sing this song to yourself as it rights itself. Its mouth opens once more. You bring the axe down right above its head. You crack the center of its armored plate. The top of its head caves in and you watch as the eyes go dull and the body collapses and falls to the ground, unmoving. Its body is still there, though, because it's very big. It only loses about two feet of height as it collapses, and it's still blocking a large portion of that hallway right now. That's your first hit. You still have half of your movement, still, because you used half of it to get up from prone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I try and push him out of the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just vault over it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, I'm going to (leaping noise) over the side, hardcore parkour. One-handed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Duke boys, sliding over the hood of the car?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using your boots, or just making an athletics check as part of your movement?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's use the Boots of Feral Leaping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make your athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Towards his left. Yep. And I'll move up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have 25 more feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do, don't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your piece. Look at that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I get around here on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you could. You can make an acrobatics check to see if you can avoid the lava as you do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I want to!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make an acrobatics, not athletics.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Acrobatics. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? You just barely make it around that corner, curling around. Yeah, you don't go foot-first in the lava, like somebody else did earlier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm picturing Grog being like (intense grunting, careful inching, intense grunting).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's about where you can get to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm right there, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of your turn, Grog. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As my holy self, imbued with the holy power of whatever I am, I float up a bit, draw my greatsword that I always use to attack because I'm awesome and bring it down real hard on the head of the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you naked with a sword hanging from your hip?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's hitting it with his dick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm naked with a belt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's Mr. November.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits. The babies don't have quite as hard armor. As you bring the greatsword down, you strike with a large swipe of bright, divine radiant energy. As it slams into the top of its head, it explodes with radiant power.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I roll, or do I use these stats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You roll damage. The stats are for me. 4d6 plus seven slashing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven, 12, 18 plus seven is 25. Plus I need 5d8.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah! Use mine! They just did very good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, dude. Planetar form isn't messing around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He didn't shake them, you just put them on down. That was the shadiest roll ever. If you did that in Vegas, they'd be like, "No."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The pit boss over here disapproves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus 14. So that's 39, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 39, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On my first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So first off, I forgot earlier. Grog, you did take another seven points of fire damage from being in the proximity of the corpse, which is still emanating heat, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Halved, because I have resistance from the enlargement now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Well, at the top of your turn, you got that, because you did not enlarge inside. And you also, as your planetar form, did take ten points of fire damage in your proximity to that one there, as well, so mark that. However, you, with that first strike, slam down and cleave the head in half. You watch as the baby's head (gravelly shriek). It had taken 49 damage before from her Chain Lightning. So with that second hit, (whack) it (gurgles) and falls to the ground, no longer moving. There is only one currently living child on the battlefield.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Well, then I'll say a silent prayer for the fallen and then fly backwards super fast to the other one (whoosh) and attack again!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you can make it a pet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 still hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey! All right. Look at all these crazy things. 12 plus-- that's not very good. 12 plus all those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was 12 plus seven?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 19 damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (counting) 19. Whatever I just said. Is that 19 plus 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 plus 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 38 damage. That kills it, yeah. So you hack one down, dart across the way with your blade screaming in the air. It actually cuts through the rock as it sparks across the ceiling. With what little space you have, your wings open, slam down on the second child and watch as its armored body cracks open. The radiant blast expands and bursts when the blade is actually dug a few inches into its form, causing you to destroy it from the inside of its armored shell. You watch as its body inflates for a second, then falls limp as smoke begins to pour from its wounds. So with that, you guys have wiped out the current danger on the battlefield.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like there's more coming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that was it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're just traumatized.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Core Anvil is going to float up from the magma.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so hot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As he herniates a disc.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look around for anything that resembles an anvil or a shelf or something that one might wackadoodle on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. Watch me knock this out of the park.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say more of a perception check for this. This is less of searching for details.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's better. Still shitty. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pathway still continues to descend and curve around, but that's it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The pathway still continues to descend around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. Very observant of you, Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Descended around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Copy that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see now because of all the glow coming from-- does magma glow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of you, aside from Percival, can see decently in low light, anyway, or have darkvision.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's only been about 25 seconds, but we do eventually have to breathe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I'll use my chalice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah. Pass the jug.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, as a planetar, let's see here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I'm dying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I think I probably need air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you have a pretty high con bonus. You could hold your breath for seven minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do that. See how I fare.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you still have Heroes' Feast?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think I do. I'm a new body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. True Polymorph, you absorb your gear and you don't benefit from it, but it doesn't say anything about you not benefiting from--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Previous spells and bonuses. That's an interesting point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The soul is imbued with Heroes' Feast, not the body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we're along the path to the water that I saw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The gear melds into the new form. The creature cannot activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of its equipment, but it doesn't say anything else other than equipment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Lindsay Lohan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're very welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I still can't breathe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have the same effect earlier that she put on you, so you still have the water breathing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! So I can breathe some water. All right, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're flying in here with the small space you have. Being a large creature, the fact that you even flew across-- you were only a few inches off the ground as you darted over. It's only about ten to 12 feet, and you're maybe nine feet tall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're 12 feet tall, so you're hitting the ceiling?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start peering around the corner with the flashlight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're under two minutes away from the water I previously made it up to and didn't go into, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You're maybe 40 seconds away from it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to head that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys dart around the corner and follow the next pool. You have your means of passing water around, keeping yourselves viable. The path continues to curve in a haphazard spiral. It curves around and you watch as it passes, evens out, and then goes into a fairly steep decline, a 45-degree decline.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I try flying down there with the broom?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're 30 seconds away from the water. I've already gone this way and come back to you guys. Unless something has jumped in the hole while I was gone in that time, I've already covered this ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is further than you covered. There's the pool of water you saw, and if you continue around that way, you can see it curve as you glance around and it descends in a steady decline.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The pool of water is just a pool of water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a small, little pit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to recast Pass Without a Trace on all of us, P.S.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can follow you down there, too, because I've got my boots on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do the two twins want to scout?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pool of water, by the way, as you glance down and look past the surface, it does have a cylindrical tube that is feeding the liquid into it, but it's much smaller. It gets to that big of a pinching point before it vanishes out of sight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of your hands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of the pool. Continuing down the path of the tunnel, as it curves around and goes into the decline, it continues and maintains its width of about 15 to 20 feet on either side. You glance down the decline, and there's a portion of the ground that opens up and glowing molten rock slowly drips and dribbles down for about 40 or 50 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Detect Evil and then wordlessly speak to you all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, in our brains? I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I say: Brothers and sisters. Allow me to guide us by the spirits of my religious faith down into the depths of this hell place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While he's talking, I turn to my sister and go--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you still you, Scanlan, just in another body?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, my child. Inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boners and wangs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's weird that you're nine feet tall, but your penis is still a cube.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you can recognize me if I die in a fight and you have to go to a lab and identify the body, you'll be like (fake crying) oh, it's him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And they shall know him by his cube.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry. Yes. Lead the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been cooling and causing this extra layer on the tunnel. Everything here seems to be in this weird state of flux. You continue past it, and it drops into a tunnel below, maybe about 20 or 30 feet wide. Descends downward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Straight down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Straight down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go down a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You descend about 30 or 40 feet. This cylinder-like tunnel comes to a halt; it stops.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I detecting any evil?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are not detecting any evil, no. Do you have darkvision in this form?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know! Where does it say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It says truesight. You don't have darkvision; you have

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Predator vision.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can also speak every language!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Given that case, as soon as you land, you look up and you can see across the rock here, there is one portion of the wall that is smoother than the rest in a concave perfect square across the opposite side. You can see faint runes or glyphs that are pressed into the stone, like part of it has been untouched for quite some time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there writing or is it just symbols?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you can read any language, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It says languages: all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the most irritated I've ever seen Matt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is because of the planetar, not Ioun? Planetar. This is how you must stay always.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is an exit seal. It is a final word of those that utilized the space within. It translates to, "Here the Crafter's Halls lay dark, the means of making the World Ender gone. Allhammer protect us all."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Allhammer. Wow. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Allhammer. Make a religion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Allhammer was--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Looking. Religion. I don't know. 11 plus I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Recalling that information, you have this information in your mind, I'll say. As long as you didn't roll a one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't remember it, but you remember it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Allhammer is one of the prime gods of family, craft, and construction of fine, important things. It is the patron saint of all craftsmen, blacksmiths, forgemasters, artisans, and from the information you received from Ioun, the creator of and last user of the Core Anvil.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So is it "the Allhammer lies beyond"? "Is dark"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was an exit phrase placed on this door by the last person who was in this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here the Crafter's Hall remains dark, the Allhammer--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Watch over us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Watch over us. Something about watching over us. Yeah, validate free parking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Objects in hammer are closer than they appear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll fly back and report to the rest in my pristine body. My pristine, hairless body. And that is what I saw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was all in our heads?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's what we're looking for, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was a flight down, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm back to being pristine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just so everyone here understands, imagine between most conversations, there's somebody doing that into a small jar of water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (blowing water bubbles) And it's all cloudy now from everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How often can you re-up that jar? Oh god, it's nasty water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're motorboating a gravy bowl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like a horse trough. There's hair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we head down there? Did it seem like you could pass through that door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I didn't try the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't try to get through it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all right. We can find a way. It's just a door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just a door; we'll be fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're great entering doors. Great history with doors. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's doing what to get down there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm walking down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You (footsteps) on the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am flying down with the broom. Does anybody else need to ride? Do you need to bamf your wings out, or do you want to get on the broom?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to save those. I'll get on the broom. You're offering me a ride on the broom!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got the carpet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take the carpet or whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you're the only one who can read them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More of that. All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? What does it say?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a "shop's closed," I suppose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we reopen it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No indicator of that. It was essentially, (door click) "Key is locked up forever. Bye! Bless "this seal."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bust through this shit or undo it? Do we have a way to cancel the seal out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it's quite literally a family business. We're closed, retired. Bars in front of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get that sense. The forge was made by and for the use of the Allhammer, and the Allhammer is locked somewhere on his own plane across the other side of the Divine Gate and has been for 800 years.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Something-made door, right. Natural rock around it or is everything carved?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural volcanic rock. It's that same crumbly, porous black stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to touch the doors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It feels like the rest of the surrounding stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no obvious mechanism for opening it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I pray to Pelor?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's awful. No. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No current sign of anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anytime I look for anything worthwhile, I stare at rock going, huh! Found a rock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to pray to Pelor. I don't know if it makes a difference.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to say: well. We are here at a doorway. I don't know if you speak to the Allhammer, if you know anything about this, but if you have any way to help us get through this, now would be the time. Trying to do good work here for you and all of mankind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about your bean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah. Well, I'm going to take the bean out and say all that shit again with the bean in between my hands. I'm going to whisper it to the bean because it's part of him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you hear the ocean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ocean bean. Putting the words and thoughts out there. Prayer is still a foreign thing to you that you're still learning to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why it was so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no words that respond, but you do get a warm sense pushing you forward. You get the idea from whatever guidance Pelor is sending your direction that you can translate from your only recently somewhat-faithful heart that you're on the right path. That's as much as you can muster from the conversation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to jump the gun, but I did punch a volcano today. This door, probably not too big a tuna for me to filet, you know what I mean? Unless the runes say, "If you punch, melt you will."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It didn't say anything like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It didn't?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It seems like it's just closed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they glowing runes? Are they magical runes? Do they seem like they're magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is an interesting point I should have recalled. Grog, are you still in your large form or not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How did you use the magic carpet to get across? That carpet will not carry you in your large form.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, good point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're little. Or you could have--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just slid down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, could you have stretched to either side and he does a Ninja Warrior shit down the tube?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we don't know how wide. How wide?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's what I mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The passageway heading downward would probably be somewhere in the neighborhood of between 15 to 20 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about a Wonder Woman situation where you (impacts). Because you got the siege gauntlets on? And you make handholds?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long a drop was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the drop wasn't the issue. It was the 40 feet of lava that was curling down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could fly down and put me in the necklace, if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, sure, that's what I did. Popped Trinket out, flew back up, grabbed Grog, came back down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From a logistical standpoint, I recalled that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so what are you guys going to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are the runes glowing? Are the runes not glowing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the runes aren't glowing. You get the sense, Scanlan, that it was less that they were glowing, more that your truesight revealed the presence--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To me, everything is glowing a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are a little Neo in the Matrix in this new physical form.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tommy Wiseau is what I'm getting from this. I'm going to take the Sun Stone out of its little container, and really light up the room, and just illuminate the whole room now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a door knob or anything that looks like a seal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, somebody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. Glancing about, with the help of his light, as well, you look and you can see most of the rock is jagged and broken in places, and as you feel the edges, some parts flake off relatively easy, and when you get to the section of where that rectangular piece of the wall is that the glyphs are put across, it looks like it's a little smoothed over, like someone smoothed it down to make this intentional seal, but there's no sign of any sort of keyhole or handle or anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you could push it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's try being polite, first. I will knock on the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's heavy stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, fuck this. I try and push the door either in and to either side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Go Strongjaw, go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're inspired.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, I'll use that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a d12.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it is? Oh shit. Awesome. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then eventually, it gives out suddenly, and you watch as suddenly the entire square structure falls inward with a slamming echo sound that echoes again and again, down a stairway that disappears from view about 20 feet ahead of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check for traps!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not my thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20 doesn't mean you succeed, necessarily.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 18 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Both of you glance throughout the initial--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, what do your elven eyes see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- steps into the hallway, which is now littered with broken rock for the first ten feet or so, with a platform where the large rectangular metal structure fell over. No signs of any traps, no signs of any tweaking with the floor or walls for any triggers. You do notice that the metal surfaces here are a texture of rough, hammered metal. You can see the series of small indentations, like all these have been hammered into place, and it looks like the seams where these large metallic wall slabs would be have a thin little placed bar over those, as well. You've gone from central volcano, natural, emerging and expanding rock and lava to a place of very intense, intended construct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like this is it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would my greedy eyes know what kind of metal it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all pewter. Pewter everywhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Intelligence. Investigation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this would be just an intelligence check. Just a straight modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Oh! Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? (sighs) You're not entirely certain of the metal. It is a dark, dull, slate gray. A little darker than that, even, and elements of the edges appear to be almost red. Almost like a rust or ruddy color, but you don't recognize what type of metal it is, necessarily.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm stealthing. I'm stealthing down the steps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did cast Pass Without a Trace on all of us again a while ago. I said it. I even marked it off after the fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You rolled a natural 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep. Using a Luck. But yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using Luck. You've used three Lucks today.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three of my four, according to your campaign guide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As sort of an inside joke for the previous more than three Lucks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that was my third, not my fourth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, I'm saying for the purposes of the guide being released and you embracing your fate-touched nature and the extremely dutiful adherence to the law of your Raven Queen... sure, I'll give you a fate-touched additional fourth Luck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's throwing you a bone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know why? Because he knows Liam bought the book.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did buy the book. I bought the book in the first hour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I bought the book, too. What do I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your one-inch cube suddenly grows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To two inches!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Angel wang, by the way, is a good band name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Angel wang.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to fly over to Vex and wordlessly say to her, be honest. Do you think I'm more handsome like this or as normal Scanlan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to think in my head, Scanlan's the best.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're always my favorite when you're just yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, this hallway that you guys have pushed through now, it's about 20 feet wide, 30 feet tall, and this long ceiling gradually curves to an apex point, like two adjoining sides of a roof. And it continues to progress forward, and then descends with the staircase.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are the walls hot to the touch, since they're metal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You put your hand out and feel it, and yes, they are. Not like (sizzle), but your hand can rest for a few seconds before you have to remove it. They're very hot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We progress forward into the room down the stairs. Wherever the stairs lead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. You leading?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm 60 feet ahead with my 47 stealth right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Okay. So as you begin, first thing you notice, the steps? They're long steps. They are about three feet wide each step.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: God-sized.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're having to like, step, step, step, leap down a few feet, continue again, leap down a few feet, and each of you are doing this. Who here does not have magic boots?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, just part of my armor. If that's not boots, then it's probably just the front guards, huh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're flying. You're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I've got my broom. That I just said I was on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So you're fine. You, as you're walking, the ground is very hot, and you can continue to move your feet in a way where it's not too bad, but you get the sense if you were wearing normal boots and not the usual Ashari-made, leather setup that you work on, they would probably be melting across the metal floor here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to hop up on this broom?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm just-- big strides. Big strides!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. It looks awkward, but stay there, if you'd rather.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try to look more normal while still taking big strides.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not working.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. The air itself now smells of very caustic fumes mixed with the smell of burning coal, but there is oxygen now in this chamber. You can breathe. There's enough air to actually get a lungful here and there, though it is still thin, and there is still the toxic fume here that had you not had the Heroes' Feast, you'd be having a rough time. But you're not having to constantly dip into the jug anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did one of y'all growl just now? That was you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or did it come out of the speaker?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That shit was too loud from a weird direction. I got all haunted house for a second. I was like, (gasps).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I cannot wait to get to Halloween Horror Nights with you again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Travis Willingham's fatal flaw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm quick as hell. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are quick. That's why we leave you ten feet ahead of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are the best jump scare.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One of these days you're going to break someone's nose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. Ah! I'm so sorry! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be glorious. Anyway, as you descend the staircase, you ahead, make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, that's good. Perception, you say? 27!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: the stairs are continuing and continuing and continuing, and you have no idea how long it'll go for, but you begin to sense as you're walking, and you hear this faint rhythmic, bassy rumble of a low, nearly inaudible, drum-like beat, deeper than any sound you've heard, quaking the ground ever so faintly. (slow, rumbling pulses) And you can very faintly feel it. You get down and move your fingers to the ground, and for the moments before the heat gets there, the next time you hear it, you can feel a very faint vibration, only because you are very perceptive at the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it exactly rhythmic? Precisely?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say, with your high perception check, you can tell that yes, it is precisely rhythmic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think there's some sort of god-sized machinery ahead of us. I think we're getting close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you lose your earring because you're an angel now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, he keeps all his stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have the earring, but I can talk to you telepathically in any language. How about Italian, darling? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop being creepy, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I sense my hour is coming to an end soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are about 20 minutes out, both you and Grog, before you lose your forms.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know binary? One, zero, zero, one, zero, one, one, zero, one, zero, one...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Speak in Morse code.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another ten, 15 minutes of descending these stairs that seem to go on and on and on, and you guys are starting to hear this (low rumbling), but it is getting steadily louder the further down you climb, Vax. You begin to see along the metallic walls, occasionally, shapes in the metal. And you glance over, Vax, and look, and you can see, carved from the metal, humanoid, armored warriors standing about ten or so feet tall, larger than normal. Their poses vary. Some of them are on the side, some of them are attacking, some of them are defending, and about every 25 or 30 feet or so, there will be one on one side or the other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they standing free, or are they carved from the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they're from the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're drawings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're reliefs. They're metallic reliefs in the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not some metal Medusa that turned them into metal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Made of the same metal, it looks like, as the walls around them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to quickly inspect one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm rolling terribly. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to look at them, too. I want to fly up on my broom. I was going to say it and then he said it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please don't be golems that will come out and fight us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Investigation? 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22? Glancing around the seams, these appear to be just reliefs in the wall. There is no deeper seam. Their proportions are flattened. They are designs in the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the style indicate anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's immaculate. It's artistic, the level of detail put into these.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog. Do you trust this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To what are you pointing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The reliefs, the people in the wall? Okay. It was a hypothetical question.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Do I trust the art?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just to be safe, I cast Freedom of Movement on Grog. Just in case.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh. I start popping and locking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So loose. So free. So much movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that lasts for an hour, great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to be stealthy. I don't want to be noisy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll stealth, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So what is the marching order here, please?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't actually mind taking the lead on this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have five minutes left, or less?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're pushing about ten minutes or so at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think five to ten minutes, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you had said 15.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love walking on the wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could stay like this forever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'll be in the middle of the group, walking on the wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so beautiful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You look over and Scanlan's going (kisses).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So symmetrical.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm actually going to hang back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Vax behind. It's Percy and Grog up front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go up behind Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll be with Vex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (hums) 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You heal 31 hit points, Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, plus three. 34.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you're also freed from any curse, disease, or blindness that you have, just FYI.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm also going to dump 20 hit points of Lay on Hands on my own damn self.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is that ding to your saving throws considered a curse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a curse that can only be broken by a god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If he fucking brings it up to a god. He doesn't even realize he has it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I tried to talk to Pelor, but people were like, "No, don't talk to Pelor."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you fucking talking about?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, continuing the charge forward, taking the steps, eventually you begin to see a source of some light. A faint, orangish-red light. Your initial instinct, based on your previous travels through here, is molten rock. It's a very similar orangish-red color from this distance. As you descend, step upon heavy step upon heavy step, you watch as you can see a square orange opening below. As in, the pointed hallway that leads you down comes to an end, and the stairs descend into a chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would Trinket's little feet hurt if he was on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to put Trinket out of your necklace?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I figure I would have tried to put him out when we got in the tunnel, but if his feet were hurting, I would have put him back in the necklace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say Trinket's not comfortable, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll keep him in, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Central to the chamber ahead of you, across the wall that you see there, there is a glowing pit of heated coals, about 15 feet on any side that marks the floor before a giant, metal wall with two X-shaped cross beams that hit the corners of where that wall begins on each side. And in the center where they meet, you see a raised relief of solid gold bolted there that surrounds an opening of some kind. There's a space in that golden relief.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's the floor look like from here to there? The same surface?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same metallic surface.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any seams, or just smooth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, for the floor in here, it would be fairly smooth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How high off the ground is that relief?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 25 feet to the ceiling, and it's halfway down, so it's about 12 and a half feet in the center, so from the ground, you'd have to get up to see it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I move closer towards that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You walk up, and you come to the very bottom of the last step. (grunts) Leap onto the ground, walk forward to the edge of where the coals are, there at the base of your feet. You glance up and you can see it. Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you glance up and you can see the relief of solid gold. The opening in it is triangle-shaped, roughly one foot across from point to point, like that. It comes into a triangular point. And it's about that size; it's about a foot, and then a foot, and then a foot.

lines.name: LAURA
