lines.text: I think you're supposed to stick your hand in it, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just the triangle shape, right? There's nothing else around it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a weird rough circle, and then the triangle is carved into the center of it. The two walls immediately to the right and the left of that, where the hexagonal pulls back to each side, you see two more of those metal warrior reliefs that you saw earlier in the hallway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the coals are in a circle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The coals are in a square section, a 15 by 15-foot square section of the floor in front of you that leads right up to the wall with the giant X meeting the seams in the relief.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sighs) Might have to Tony Robbins this shit, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like anything's supposed to go in the triangle? Does it look like a keyhole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like a gold relief that has a triangular hole in it. That's all you can see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see how deep the hole goes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to get closer to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to get close to it on my broom and look at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like all the corners eventually converge to a point on the interior of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. All right. I back up so that I'm not in the fumes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anything else in the room besides the two reliefs on either side that we can see? Tools?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys want to walk around the back of the staircase? As you guys move around the back of the staircase, the wall on the opposite side of that relief contains a third armored warrior relief embedded in the wall. You can see there are four pillars right along the side of where the staircase descends that contain bolted-in, large braziers that contain ever-burning flames, flickering, that give that orange-red glow, similar to the coals you saw embedded in the ground as you arrived. And then on the back side of the staircase and the column that held it aloft, you recognize it immediately, Grog, strangely. Because while you've not cared or understood what these things are before, suddenly you know what it is. You see a large metal-- it looks like a well, almost, but there is a furnace built into it and a number of tools that are hanging to the side, small tongs and heavy leather gauntlets. This is a smelter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's where we have to smelt the platinum. Do we see anything around the room that looks like it could fit in that pyramid shape?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast, again, Detect Good and Evil, and do a swoop around and see if I sense any creatures or magically consecrated objects.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You swoop around the room. You detect no evil. You detect no magically consecrated objects. And at that point, the spell's about to fade or become permanent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) Big choice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You mean, you'll stay like that forever? You can't undo it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, my child. I will drop the spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And with that, a smaller Scanlan form appears, the planetar angelic form vanishing, and he drops about four feet and lands on his feet on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel my back, covered in hair. I'm back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still massive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we're supposed to smelt the platinum, right? Melt it down. And then we use our magic beans to make the Prime Trammels.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I understand how this triangle works?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This triangle does not at all resemble any of the designs that you had imbued upon you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hop up to take a better look at it, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you walk up the side and look into it and you can see it's a triangle, and then pushing inward, all the points converge on the inside where it would fit a pyramid structure, about one foot on each side, corner to corner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the point at which they connect, is that about a quarter size, would you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The point where it connects, it goes to a complete point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Complete point, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And that relief is in the middle of two crossbeams? So you couldn't push the crossbeams over and lay it down flat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the cross beams are bolted to the actual wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not something we have to lay flat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you say there were two metal warriors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two metal warriors to the right and left and then one on the back wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And are they separated from where we are by hot coals, or can you walk right up to them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The only hot coals are the ones that reside directly beneath the relief.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to check one of those out. See if it's any different than what we passed in that hallway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you said there were three warriors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we can get to the smelter right now, or it's beyond the crossbeams?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The smelter is on the other of the room, behind the staircase.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All the shit we need?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all are clutching a long greatsword in one hand. The other appears to be open to either receive something or hold aloft something that's not there, and they're all facing forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm shooting my wings out as I walk up to them, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the outside of the head and a similar triangle gap in the face that's smaller than the one in the relief. You glance over quickly into the other warrior, and the third, and all three of them are faceless, instead having an empty triangle that disappears into the face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It goes inward like the big one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. But they're smaller.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While he does that, I stand in the middle. Are the three warriors triangulated, if you were to draw out a triangle between them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the hexagonal room, yes, they would be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the same shape?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to be. Close enough, at least, based on the construction of the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did the reliefs have in their hands? Weapons? Swords? Axes? Hammers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they're all greatswords, but they're also part of the relief embedded in the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And one open hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One open hand. It's embedded in the wall, and the other one is open to the side. But the relief is all embedded in the wall, and you can see the triangular opening. The only thing that darts inward is that vacuous shape in the face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is where Vox Machina dies because they can't figure out--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't figure out how the triangle works.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anything on the floor? Any patterns on the floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The smelter, is it active right now? Is it hot?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the coals are cooking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The smelter is low, but it's burning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if we have to make something triangular?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, to fit in those things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Doesn't appear to be. The floor is pretty solid. There's no real detail that catches your attention.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's start smelting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Might as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if we take those beans and put them in the little triangle holes? I don't know. In their hands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the statues are in the wall and you can see the outer shape, barely protruding from the wall, so it would be hard to place something in the hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we switched all our gold for platinum in Vasselheim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, so let's start the smelter, at the very least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The bellows are there. The big old heavy bellows, and Grog, you know exactly what to do. It's a really strange phenomenon to be like, "I've never done this," but it's second nature, and you begin to get that forge to well and burn, and brightly. You can see the flames and the coals heat up from dull red to a bright orange to a white at times, and as it heats up, you have the tongs. What do you smelt in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But what to smelt in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to walk across.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense here that smelting is the heating and liquefying of metals: one, to remove impurities, and two, to then pour into a mold in which, when it cools, the metal makes the shape of whatever the mold is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I fly up to the circle on the wall, on the crossbeams? Does it come off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's built into the wall. It's a smooth, shiny, polished gold, but it's not moving at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't find anything that makes a triangle shape, a pyramid shape, in the room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The faces of the statuary. Maybe we should prod them. We might as well start prodding things, because nothing's going to happen if we don't prod them. I'm going to crawl up to one of the statuary soldiers and see if the helmet comes off, or if the face is removable. I'm going to start tinkering.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach up and grab the side and feel the side of the face and reach into the inside of the gap in the triangular void, if you will.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That thing is going to go click, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's imperfect and messed up. It's hard to see what it is, but it's not a perfect triangle like the rest. Also, immediately, you guys see there's a flash of orange light that completely surrounds the exterior of the warrior, and the two other warriors, their entire outer line glows a bright orange, and with that, you instinctually step back--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I step up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or yeah, step up, as all three of them (heavy movement) step out of the wall. Unlike the ones you saw previously that were pressed in and relief, these have a little more dimension to them, and the majority of their physical form was embedded backwards into the wall. They all of a sudden come storming outward, giant greatswords swinging in front of them, as they all immediately, the heads creepily with the open, triangular void of where a face would be spin to one of the nearby individuals in their space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, maybe we have to kill them and then smelt into their faces.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm into it. I like this plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't destroy their faces!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where we'll pick up next week, because it is almost 11:00.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. How tall are they? How big were they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about ten to 12 feet tall?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And they're made out of metal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're made out of the same metal material, it looks like, that the walls are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're golems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constructs of some kind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those crossbeams, do they look like they're structurally integral to the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. They're bolted against the far wall, and it looks more ornamental, or at least there are seams against that back wall to hold a relief there or at least that's where the relief is placed. You get the sense with more inspection, you'd get a better feel, but it doesn't look like, immediately at glance, it's integral to the design. So! We'll pick up right at the beginning of those large, metallic creatures emerging from the walls and the ensuing conflict next week. In the meantime, thank you guys so much for joining us on the next crazy step of our adventure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Happy birthday!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Happy birthday, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's still for another hour! Thank you, Magic: the Gathering - Puzzle Quest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys for watching. We'll pick up next week, and then after that is GenCon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Oh jeez.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So after next week is GenCon, so start getting that ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. Oh my god, we're going right into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. (laughs) Two weeks. All right. Have a good night, guys, rest well, thank you for coming, and as always--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll most likely kill you in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
